name: Mineralis Life — BioMineralis — 2L, 10L
ingredients:
Contiene tutti i minerali considerati come essenziali dall' FAO (Food and Agriculture Organization):
(Mg) Magnesium, (S) Sulfur, (K) Potassium, (Ca) Calcium, (F) Fluorine, (Si) Silicon, (I) Iodine, (P) Phosphorus, (Fe) Iron, (Mo) Molybdenum, (Cu)Copper, (Se) Selenium, (Sn) Tin, (Ni) Nickel, (Mn) Manganese, (Zn) Zinc, (Co) Cobalt, (Cr) Chrome, ...
